body: A quadrens looks like a dagger, but with four spikes mounted in a square pattern in place of a blade. When you score a critical hit with a quadrens, the resulting gaping wound causes 1 point of bleed damage.
name: Quadrens
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Mastering Combat/Gladiator Weapons/Gladiator Weapon Descriptions/Quadrens
